title: Phoenix Coffee
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Aotearoan place. Vegan menu items include the Flo's black bean burger, a bulgur salad, green salad, and muffins (chocolate, cinnamon, carrot, apple). Vegetarian breakfast can be requested vegan. Has soy milk and organic lemonade. Children and dog friendly. Staff speaks English.
